mapper.select: select * from (select re.re_no, re.re_title, re.re_content, re.m_no, re.re_reg, re.m_name, me.m_id, re.fileName_date from review re, member me where re.m_no = me.m_no) sub where sub.re_no = #{re_no}
select * from review order by re_no desc
insert into review(m_name, re_content, re_title,m_no, fileName_date) values (#{m_name}, #{re_content}, #{re_title},#{m_no}, #{fileName_date})
update review set re_content = #{re_content}, re_title = #{re_title} where re_no=#{re_no}
